itunes:title: Episode 708 - The New Jersey Gym Owner Who Risked It All
title: Episode 708 - The New Jersey Gym Owner Who Risked It All
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Ian Smith, the New Jersey gym who was shut down during the pandemic and has defied the governor and opened back up only to receive a $15,000 daily fine every single day for months. Crazy story.
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway welcome special guest Ian Smith, the New Jersey gym who was shut down during the pandemic and has defied the governor and opened back up only to receive a $15,000 daily fine every single day for months. Crazy story.
